support¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Support

The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

Functions¶

errorembed(ctx)

setup(bot)

support.errorembed(ctx)¶
class support.Support(bot)¶

Bases: discord.ext.commands.Cog

The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

A cog is a collection of commands, listeners, and optional state to help group commands together. More information on them can be found on the Cogs page.

When inheriting from this class, the options shown in CogMeta are equally valid here.

display_emoji(self)¶
Return type

discord.PartialEmoji

await database_class(self)¶
await support(self, ctx)¶

Open support ticket if enabled by the server admins

await resolved(self, ctx, member)¶

Resolves the existing ticket! One needs to have manage server permission in order to run this command

Parameters

member (Union[lib.MemberID, discord.Member]) –

await chksupreq(self, ctx)¶

Checks who still requires the support.

await feedback(self, ctx, *, feed)¶

Sends your feedback about the server to the server owner. (This can only be done if it is enabled by the server admin) The feedback should be less than 2000 characters
